page.title: 09OUR VILLAGE BLACKSMITH
page.content: In Peplow we are very lucky to still have a village Blacksmith. His forge is still the same as it was fifty years ago except that the bellows are now worked by electricity instead of manually. The present Blacksmith came here as an apprentice to our former farrier. The area he serves is very large and horses are brought to him to be shod or he makes their shoes and then travels to their stables to shoe them. He also spends much time travelling around, not only this country, but America also, judging at shows and demonstrating his skills for which he has won many great prizes.
